info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 9:09PM EDT until May 16 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 908 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mt Laurel to near Cluster Springs to near Alton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Buffalo Springs around 920 PM EDT. Clarksville around 930 PM EDT. Chase City around 935 PM EDT. Boydton around 940 PM EDT. South Hill around 1000 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Nelson, Spanish Grove, Beechwood, John H Kerr Dam, North View, Finchley, Skipwith, Fairview, Rogers Corner and Richardson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
